mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBERID, MEMBERPASSWORD, MEMBERNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE, EMAIL, REGDATE, USERADMIN, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, CASH, USERCHECK) VALUES ( #{memberID}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{email}, sysdate, #{userAdmin}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2},0, 0 )
